title: Lag in LoL
body: I used to play lol with around 50/60 MS, and since orn's patch Came out, im having 300 or above MS, leting the game unplayable, can somebody help me?

replies.body: Sometimes it can be a good start to double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quickly if you start seeing unusual lag after a patch. You might just need to update some port forwarding or give your DNS a good flush, so be sure to run through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
